text.section:
An officer who discovers a vehicle parked in violation of an ordinance or regulation adopted under this subtitle shall:
Deliver a citation to the driver or, if the vehicle is unattended, attach a citation to the vehicle in a conspicuous place; and
Keep a copy of the citation, bearing his certification under penalty of perjury that the facts stated in the citation are true.
In the absence of the driver, the registered owner of the vehicle is presumed to be the person receiving the citation.
